ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics

Class CommentSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.CommentSearch

  • public class CommentSearch
extends java.lang.Object
    CommentSearch is used with respect to ElasticSearch and is called upon to help in matching string queries to/from the server for sorting. This helps in maintaining the cache by sending recently pulled comments from ES to the cache.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommentSearch(CommentListModel listModel)
      CommentSearch creates a new instance of a search given a CommentListModel.
      CommentSearch(CommentListModel listModel, Cache cache)
      This CommentSearch creates a new instance of the Search given both a CommentListModel and a Cache to be searched.

      This method pulls all TopLevel comments
